details: Evaluate the dog and owners to customize a training plan based on the needs of the dog and owner
The Puppy Level 1 Program is geared towards puppies between the ages of 8 - 16 weeks (2 - 4 months) of age. The 4 week programs gives your puppy the head start they deserve.
The Puppy Level 2 Program is geared towards puppies over 4 months of age. We introduce more advanced behavior skills as well as basic public access training.
Think of it as daycare, but revoled around training
6 one hour classes where you come to our home and train with others.
Would your organization like to have Pretzel and myself come visit your facility for a therapy visit? If so, please make an appointment.
